It makes me feel better #3 Dipping by Bleach

Adam has (finally) got a love for rock and roll - and it starts broad (and so did mine) so Nirvana are his favourite band. He asked me to buy him Bleach_(album)... which I did but it just made me want to listen to Bleach_(British_band) - here's why...
